concept.title: Specialization rules
concept.shortdesc: In addition to the changes in specific domains, elements, and attributes, DITA 2.0 relaxes specialization rules to permit more flexibility in information modeling.

conbody.p:
Specialization rules are relaxed as follows:
Specialized elements may have attributes unique to that element and not present on the specialization base.
Specializations of the base and props attributes may be targeted to a specific element, rather than made available on every other element in the DTD.
Specialized elements can be introduced into content models selectively, without adding the element globally to all locations where the specialization base is valid.
